sentences.en: a piece of crispy fried bread

sentences.cn: 适用范围: 适合于易碎物料:薯片, 锅巴, 苹果片, 果冻等.

sentences.en: Crispy fried noodles. I love them.

sentences.cn: 放到锅里炸至酥脆,颜色呈金黄色即可.

sentences.en: Dining off crispy chicken , Kentucky Fried Chicken, or Daokou braised chicken, what's the difference?
sentences.cn: 香酥鸡 、 肯德基 、 道口烧鸡,大同小异.

sentences.en: I compared the bowl of soup that sat before me with the crispy chicken.
sentences.cn: 我把摆在我面前的那碗汤跟酥鸡对比一下.

sentences.en: I will suggest crispy fried duck.

sentences.cn: 主料: 黄飞鸿脆椒 、 素食半成品 、 青红椒 、 香菜.

sentences.en: It is crispy and high in protein without being oily.
sentences.cn: “鼎采香”大厨,身怀祖传秘方,每季变换一种调料,既美味又养生.

sentences.en: Mossy green envelops her in the early spring, crispy and soft.
sentences.cn: 初春的时候,她浑身绿茸茸的, 又脆又嫩.

sentences.en: Our all - white , breaded, crispy chicken Buffalo Tenders and our signature popcorn shrimp.
sentences.cn: 我们招牌的布法罗鸡块,涂上面包后烤至金黄酥脆, 搭配我们的特色虾球.

sentences.en: Peking Duck became famous for its crispy skin and tender meat.
sentences.cn: 例)北京烤鸭以皮脆肉嫩而得以闻名.

sentences.en: So, were you planning on staying here until we're all extra crispy?
sentences.cn: 那么, 你打算继续呆在这儿让我们全部被粉碎?

sentences.en: The crispy skin and the mouth melting taste , satisfying me the max!
sentences.cn: 香脆的皮和入口即化的口感, 真的让我满足到不得了!

sentences.en: The crispy texture and size make it a perfect snack for on - the - go!
sentences.cn: 香脆的质地和大小使之成为最完美的小吃!

sentences.en: Try this tasty dish for supper with a crispy salad.
sentences.cn: 晚饭就着鲜脆的色拉尝尝这道佳肴。
